title: PaaS Adoption in Financial Services Sector to Grow at 34.56% CAGR By 2018
text:
The report titled PaaS Market – Financial Services Outlook (2014-18) showcases an in-depth analysis of the market in terms of market size, end users and the respective market forces (drivers, constraints, opportunities and challenges). This report also forecasts the growth numbers till 2018 (on a YoY basis) and hence suggests the Compound Annual Growth Rate (CAGR) for the estimated period.
Financial Service firms benefitting from adoption of PaaS
Globally, financial services sector serves as the major contributor to IT industry’s revenue. The demand for various software applications for transaction processing, workflow management, trend analysis etc. in the financial services sector will drive adoption of PaaS. PaaS enables financial service industry to have the capability to develop robust and innovative applications while not worrying about scalability of infrastructure and security of data.
The security concerns regarding keeping vital data on cloud has been holding back the market from taking off financial services. With the growth in popularity of private and hybrid cloud deployment models, financial service firms are into adopting these models for their IT environments.
The ability of PaaS to integrate various cloud applications with a scalable database in the backend will serve to be the biggest opportunity for financial services firms to shift their traditional application development to the cloud. Financial service industry has also been looking at the cost cutting benefits offered by code-free PaaS, enabling non-developers to develop applications.
The features in PaaS capable of serving the requirements of banks and other financial institutions empowers agile application development process while keeping infrastructure investments low.
